msContents.summary: Tamil version of the Vikramacarita, that is, 32 stories (Tamil katai) about the king Vikrama (Vikkiramātittaṉ) told to king Bhoja by the figurines (Tamil patumai) of his throne.

msItem.title: Vikkiramātittaṉ Patumaikkatai

filiation.p: GOML R. 1972, R. 2244. UVSL, vol. 4, pp. 246-7, No. 2040. TMSSML, vol. 1 , 1925, Nos. 579 and 589.

binding.p: Leather cover, with title on the spine ("VIKRAMARKEN KADAI TAMOUL") and heraldic lilies on the spine.

origin.origDate: 1729 at the latest. 1750 according to Cabaton (1912, p. 60).

provenance.p: It appears to be the paper Vicramarquen Cadey and Vicramarken Kadey sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1729 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in ancien lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5r and f9r).
